txt.en: 'There are many mysteries within these hills, so close to the gates of Carn Dum, [placeholder]. I see that you have begun to explore those mysteries and I wish you luck, for while it has been our way for generations to let those ancient things lay sleeping, it seems that the time now approaches when they will awaken and threaten us all - with or without our interference.\n\nPerhaps you can uncover the source of the darkness that now infests our lands, before it is too late.'
Seek out Lithgor Sandwolf and tell him of your accomplishments.
